short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Trello® cards into Pomodoro® tasks. Stay focused, accomplish more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pomello turns your Trello cards into Pomodoro® tasks. This little timer is packed with features to helps you stay focused and on track to achieve your day-to-day tasks or life-changing dreams.

Even with the best To-Do List apps out there, it's far too easy to get distracted on the computer. Pomello is an app that displays your task (from your Trello board) next to a timer and it stays on top of your windows. That way, Pomello is always there to remind you of what you should be doing.

* SIMPLE AND MINIMAL
Doesn't take up your valuable screen real estate by using a simple yet intuitive interface.

* PROVEN EFFECTIVENESS
Employs the Pomodoro Technique®, a tried and true method to be more productive.

* SYNCED TO TRELLO
Use Trello to organize your tasks, which means all the extra goodness that Trello has to offer.

Pomello is constantly improving. To follow development visit: https://trello.com/b/aLvdAXsh

To request a feature, suggest an improvement, or report a bug, please visit: https://trello.com/b/pPFiIODT
